trans-unit.source: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET structures to support a configuration root object.
Represents the method that handles the ConfigChanged event of an <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRoot"></xref> object.
To be added.
Represents the method that handles the ConfigRemoved event of a <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRoot"></xref> object.
To be added.
Returns an <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object representing a configuration specified by a configuration path.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
An object representing a configuration specified by configPath.
Returns an <xref:System.Object> representing the data in a section of a configuration file.
A string representing a section of a configuration file.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
An <xref:System.Object> representing the data in a section of a configuration file.
Returns a value representing the file path of the nearest configuration ancestor that has configuration data.
The path of configuration file.
Returns a string representing the file path of the nearest configuration ancestor that has configuration data.
Returns an <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object representing a unique configuration record for given configuration path.
The path of the configuration file.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object representing a unique configuration record for a given configuration path.
Initializes a configuration object.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if design time; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if run time.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration is a design-time configuration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration is a design-time configuration; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the configuration is not a design-time configuration.
Finds and removes a configuration record and all its children for a given configuration path.
The path of the configuration file.
